=================================================

Ver 3.0 (Released May 2015)
The final version of OpenBlog mini goes back to its roots by using MySQL. The result? A blog system created using a mere 100 lines of code.

Ver 2.0 (Released Feb 2015)
OpenBlog mini 2.0 was designed to take the setup hassle out of the equation. Full HTML tag support has been added to system as well, and platform is less than 330 lines of code (and much easier to read than before [code looks nicer]).

Ver 1.0 (Released Feb 2012)
OpenBlog mini 1.0 was designed to see whether a full-featured, functioning Blog system could be created using less than 250 lines of PHP.
summary: PHP blog platform made using only 100 lines of code!
